EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for applying to work on NCS with The Challenge
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
NCSTHECHALLENGE.ORG/SEASONAL-ROLES
Please do not reply to this email. This email was sent from an unattended mailbox and responses are not reviewed. Dear {!Contact.Name}
It is good to see you back! Welcome to another year with us at The Challenge on the NCS Programme.
We aim to review applications within two weeks of receiving them.
If you do not hear back from us within this period, please contact us at seasonalroles@the-challenge.org quoting the email reference below in any correspondence.
We look forward to working with you again!
Best Wishes
